title: World-Renowned Five-Star Shangri-La Singapore Luxury near Iconic Orchard Road
description: Experience one of Singapore's Best of the Best hotels for 2021 with a stay at the world-renowned, five-star Shangri-La Singapore, ranked within the top 1% of the world on Tripadvisor. Hidden smack bang in a high-class residential estate on the fringes of Orchard Road, this city oasis feels remote and yet very central. Consider this Shangri-La escape your literal urban oasis within the heart of the city, where you can succumb to tropical bliss amid 15 acres of lush, manicured gardens with a cascading waterfall and orchard greenhouse sculpture at its centre.
